column1: I’m concerned by how many former @ICEgov & BOP officials now work for private prison & detention companies. @SenKamalaHarris @RepJayapal @RepPressley & I want to know what these agencies are doing to stop conflicts of interests & corruption. https://t.co/JHlPTLBMjG
Congratulations to Darlene Lombos for making history at the Greater Boston Labor Council! I’m glad to be in this fight with you to level the playing field for MA workers. https://t.co/4IetdLO6gs

Student loan borrowers cheated by predatory for-profit colleges shouldn’t have to pay taxes on their cancelled loans. I successfully fought for Corinthian students’ tax exemption in 2015. I’m glad @USTreasury & @IRSnews will expand relief to more students. https://t.co/Elf9jpvBDD

The Trump administration is quietly working on a new rule to kick people off of their Social Security Disability Insurance. We won’t let them dismantle Social Security inch by inch. https://t.co/FY8xbaHWhe
United States senators were sworn in today for the impeachment trial of President Trump. I took an oath to support and defend the Constitution and that's what I'll do. https://t.co/LZuwggWhj6

@EsperDoD @Raytheon @DeptofDefense The defense industry can have a seat at the table – but they shouldn’t own the table. We need to slam shut the revolving door between the Pentagon & big defense contractors like @Raytheon – @EsperDOD’s former employer. I have a bill for that. https://t.co/RgHfyGvTln

When I asked Secretary @EsperDOD – a former top lobbyist for @Raytheon – to extend his recusal from his former employer through the duration of his tenure at the @DeptofDefense he refused. That’s corruption plain and simple. https://t.co/YEHmfF1njo
My heart goes out to the @HCrossWRowing team Ms. Rett’s family & friends & the entire @holy_cross community. This is a tragedy. https://t.co/c74Td3WgJw

@BetsyDeVosED I’m standing with students scammed by for-profit colleges by cosponsoring @SenatorDurbin & @RepSusieLee’s resolution to overturn @BetsyDeVosED’s rule & fighting alongside @MassAGO Healey to make sure every defrauded MA student gets the relief they deserve. https://t.co/tn5q1xBH9E

At her confirmation hearing 3 years ago this week I asked @BetsyDeVosED if she’d be a cop on the beat when greedy for-profit colleges break the law. She hemmed & hawed & it’s now clear why: her Borrower Defense rule would slam the door on loan cancellation for cheated students. https://t.co/RNcDXhSfMX

Between January 2nd & 3rd stock prices for @NorthropGrumman @LockheedMartin & @Raytheon  – @EsperDoD’s former employer – all soared as did the price of crude oil. The SEC & CFTC must investigate whether Mar-a-Lago guests engaged in profiteering.

If Mar-a-Lago guests had advance knowledge of potential military action it raises national security concerns about President Trump’s handling of classified & sensitive information. But I'm also concerned that guests may have profited from confidential market-moving information.

Days before launching the strike that killed Iranian Major General Qasem Soleimani President Trump reportedly dropped hints to Mar-a-Lago guests that something big was coming. I’ve asked the SEC & CFTC to investigate any possible insider trading. https://t.co/LmsRsw9CFJ

The federal govt cannot fail the people of Puerto Rico once again. @NydiaVelazquez @BennieGThompson & I told President Trump to fully fund PR's emergency response & waive cost-sharing so the island gets the help it needs to recover from recent earthquakes. https://t.co/PnaXTN4Qzs

Ten years after an earthquake devastated Haiti the country has faced one setback after another in its recovery. I’m glad @DHSgov extended TPS for Haitian refugees & I’ll keeping fighting to protect Haitian families in MA & across the country. https://t.co/gTJmvNUchI

This National Blood Donor Month I’m still fighting to end the @US_FDA’s outdated & discriminatory blood donation ban for gay & bisexual men. Blood donor restrictions should be based on science & risk not sexual orientation. https://t.co/vZg7zDMwal

My housing bill will invest in 3M new housing units bring down rents by 10% & start to close the Black-white wealth gap caused by decades of housing discrimination. I’m grateful that @Marty_Walsh @Mayor_Spicer & mayors across MA support this bill. https://t.co/KVISBNsOeg

I’m very glad to see Mayor @Marty_Walsh announce bold action to tackle the housing crisis in Boston head-on. The federal govt needs to be a strong partner to cities like Boston that are fighting for more affordable housing for all of our families. https://t.co/7Fs3bB6KpR

It’s shameful that when housing discrimination is still rampant @realDonaldTrump & @SecretaryCarson want to gut civil rights laws like the Fair Housing Act. It’s time to confront the legacy of govt-backed housing discrimination & fight to reverse it. https://t.co/xy3PvJXtTz

Access to safe drinking water is a basic human right but millions of Americans – especially communities of color – have tap water that violates federal standards. I’m fighting for much-needed investments in our country’s drinking water infrastructure & so should the President.

Dangerous PFAS chemicals in our drinking water threaten the health of families in MA & across the country. It’s disgusting that the President would even consider vetoing @RepDebDingell & @SenatorCarper’s bipartisan bill to clean up PFAS-contaminated sites. https://t.co/8ZAJvhxbo4
I'm concerned by reports that Iranian Americans & others of Iranian heritage were detained at the border or denied entry into the US. I've got questions for @CBP. https://t.co/gG6bROcdgI

Puerto Rico was struggling long before last night’s earthquake & long before hurricanes devastated the island. Congress must pass my bill with @NydiaVelazquez to provide Puerto Rico a path to comprehensive debt relief so they can get back on their feet. https://t.co/14D4A5eVDG

My thoughts are with the people of Puerto Rico as they recover from a series of terrible earthquakes. We will fight to hold the Trump administration accountable so the island’s residents receive the support & respect they need to recover. https://t.co/k3NF6qjA8X

The rise in anti-Semitism & horrific attacks like those in Monsey NY have no place in our country. On #JewishandProud Day we reaffirm our solidarity with Jewish communities in MA & beyond & stand together against all forms of bigotry & hate.

The IRS has no more excuses to create its own Free File program. My bill with @BradSherman would let millions of Americans simply sign & return a pre-filled tax form & finally require the IRS to create a free online tax prep & filing service. https://t.co/GTCm49wi7N

I’m glad that the IRS is reforming the Free File program to ban tax prep companies' worst tricks & allow the IRS compete with them. But the IRS should’ve gone further to ensure that the millions of eligible taxpayers are truly able to file their taxes free of charge.

For more than 5 years I’ve pushed to replace the broken IRS Free File program that has let giant companies trick taxpayers into paying for services that should be free. Persistence works. https://t.co/56WV2ruKLl

Since 2015 I’ve said the #IranDeal was the best option to peacefully prevent a nuclear-armed Iran & prevent another war. But the President’s reckless actions have led Iran to totally scrap the deal & brought us closer to a war. https://t.co/9W1txdMG7i

We should be expanding the services of the @USPS – not privatizing it. I've spent years fighting for postal banking to provide basic banking services like savings accounts for millions of underserved Americans. https://t.co/Xa2DOMwOmL

Washington has looked the other way while private equity firms have gutted companies hurt workers & drained our economy. That’s why my bill to #StopWallStreetLooting would fundamentally change the private equity industry. https://t.co/vNhfTZbp2m
Wishing everyone in Massachusetts across the country & around the world a safe & happy New Year’s celebration! I’m deeply grateful for the opportunity to keep fighting alongside you.
Nobody fights harder in Congress than our hero @repjohnlewis & our hearts will be with him & his family every step of the way in this next fight. https://t.co/lLqbQT2njG

I’m glad to be a cosponsor of @SenatorBaldwin’s bill to rein in stock buybacks that help wealthy CEOs get richer while workers get left behind. I’m in this fight to level the playing field all the way. https://t.co/vgXsLV2h4q

Lack of competition in the generic drug market means giant drug companies are doing great while families are getting crushed. @JanSchakowsky & I are reintroducing our bill to fix the generic drug market by letting @HHSGov manufacture generic drugs. https://t.co/qX2czEEzxQ

China's govt is subjecting over 1 million Muslims in Xinjiang to mass internment forced labor & other human rights abuses. The #XinjiangPapers confirm this is state-sponsored cruelty. I joined @RepMcGovern’s bipartisan letter urging the Trump admin to hold China accountable. https://t.co/nN6k0AltTv

Veterans have sacrificed so much for us. But our outdated federal marijuana laws prevent vets who work in their state’s legal cannabis industry from getting a VA-backed home loan to realize the dream of homeownership. I have a bipartisan bill for that. https://t.co/2NJt0PIMvS

It’s nonsense that Americans should have to ration their life-saving prescriptions because a handful of giant drug companies have rigged the market to jack up prices & line their pockets. Drug manufacturers are charging sky-high prices – and Congress must act to stop them.

In 1996 Eli Lilly’s insulin cost $21/vial. Today it’s about $300/vial in the United States. The millions of Americans living with diabetes don’t need insults from Lilly’s highly paid CEO – they need the drug that they can’t live without.

Eli Lilly broke its promise to provide cheaper generic insulin to the American people. Most pharmacies we surveyed don’t have it & can’t order it. That may be “nonsense” to you Mr. Ricks – but it’s not nonsense to people who can’t afford insulin. https://t.co/XelV3VRlHy

I'm proud of the entire Massachusetts delegation for fulfilling their oath to defend the United States Constitution today. Thank you @RepRichardNeal @RepMcGovern @RepLoriTrahan @RepJoeKennedy @RepKClark @TeamMoulton @RepPressley @RepStephenLynch & @USRepKeating.

US Senators take an oath to support & defend the Constitution not the President of the United States. The Constitution requires the Senate to conduct a fair & honest impeachment trial & that’s what the American people expect.

My #StopWallStreetLooting Act with @RepMarkPocan & others would hold private equity firms responsible for the liabilities of companies under their control & require greater transparency in private equity firms’ practices. Our economy – and our planet – can’t wait any longer.

It is deeply disturbing that a US private equity firm like @Blackstone has invested in Brazilian logistics company Hidrovias to take advantage of weakened environmental safeguards & boost their short-term profits at the expense of our global climate & Indigenous communities.

Private equity firm @Blackstone has made big investments in companies that are destroying the Amazon rainforest. @RepMarkPocan @RepRaulGrijalva @RepDebHaaland @RepRashida @RepChuyGarcia @SenWhitehouse & I want them to explain their business practices. https://t.co/9JURIUoMQL

3 drug companies produce 80%+ of all insulin & lack of competition is crushing families. That’s why @janschakowsky & I have a bill to let @HHSgov manufacture generic drugs like insulin to fix the broken market. And I support #M4A so nobody goes broke paying for health care.

Our staff called nearly 400 pharmacies across the country. 83% didn't have @LillyPad’s generic insulin in stock & 69% of those said they couldn’t order it. Eli Lilly needs to take meaningful steps to increase insulin access & make Humalog more affordable https://t.co/dGbMgqBmvA

Pharmaceutical giant Eli Lilly promised in March that it would provide patients with a lower-priced generic insulin. But @SenBlumenthal & I conducted a months-long survey of pharmacies & found that @LillyPad hasn't lived up to its promise. https://t.co/XSpWf7sV0z

It’s been 2 years since the Trump administration gutted #NetNeutrality. And it’s been 8 months since the House passed the #SaveTheInternet Act to restore those rules for a free & open internet. It’s time to stop throttling & give @SenMarkey’s bill a vote @SenateMajLdr McConnell. https://t.co/1aLgR7373I

It’s been 7 years since the tragedy at Sandy Hook Elementary School & we’re still calling on the @SenateGOP to pass even the most basic gun safety legislation to help keep our kids safe. Today we remember we mourn & we continue to fight back.  #StopGunViolence https://t.co/G0JNsvgbw9

I’m glad @USCIS did the right thing for the Sanchez family after @RepPressley @SenMarkey & I fought the admin's decision to order sick kids to leave the US. We won’t stop fighting this admin’s cruel policies that inflict pain on children & families. https://t.co/NSa9OXeTIf

I join the Armenian American community in MA & the rest of the Armenian diaspora in celebrating the Senate passage of a resolution recognizing the #ArmenianGenocide. I cosponsored S.Res.150 to recognize this tragedy. It has been far too long. https://t.co/TLVIxcGo4K

Predatory for-profit colleges don't care about educating students – they’re in the business of sucking down federal student aid. That’s why I support @SenSherrodBrown & @RepJayapal’s #StudentsNotProfits Act to end taxpayer subsidies to these schools. It’s time for this to end.

Instead of helping defrauded students @BetsyDeVosED & @usedgov have come up with an arbitrary & nonsense scheme to choke off any reasonable debt cancellation for students cheated by sham for-profits. https://t.co/hPLsSbCUx0

The University of Phoenix used deceptive ads to lure students in with big promises of well-paid jobs – then loaded them up with debt & useless degrees. @BetsyDeVosED & @usedgov need to follow the @FTC’s lead & cancel @UOPX students’ federal loans. https://t.co/TC9tUMmgsk

.@RepJayapal & I have introduced the most ambitious bill to #EndCorruptionNow since Watergate which would force Presidents to fully divest from their businesses – and hotels. We need to fundamentally change how Washington works – and who Washington works for.

Taxpayers shouldn’t have to pay the legal bills of a private company and the government shouldn’t protect a private prison carrying out inhumane immigration policies – especially one that bats its eyelashes from the Trump Hotel lobby.

Of all the hotels in DC why did the Senior VP of GEO Group – one of @ICEgov’s private prison operators – stay at the Trump Hotel while asking the admin for a favor to pay its legal fees? @RepJayapal & I have serious concerns about possible corruption. https://t.co/HkQLGzLiuD

The NDAA does nothing to end our disastrous and inhumane support for Saudi ops in Yemen nothing to prevent a war with Iran and permits the deployment of a destabilizing low yield nuke weapon. For that and 738 billion other reasons I don’t support the bill.
The Pentagon’s budget has been too large for too long. I cannot support a defense bill that’s a $738 billion Christmas present to giant defense contractors & undermines our values and security.

Pete Frates challenged us all to fight harder for a cure to ALS – & in doing so he inspired the world. My heart goes out to Pete’s wife daughter family & friends in MA & across the US. Let’s remember him by keeping up the fight for the people we love. https://t.co/bn0Iubkmuu

MLB’s proposal to eliminate the @LowellSpinners affiliation with the @RedSox & @MLB – and do the same to 41 more @MiLB clubs – is a slap in the face to Lowell & communities across the country. @SenMarkey & I urge MLB to rethink this shortsighted plan. https://t.co/rsoc0JNMJg

Few people have had more impact on our modern financial system than the great Paul Volcker. For more than 5 decades he fought for more robust efficient & effective rules to keep the US economy safe. I’m very sorry for his loss. https://t.co/lIPbFD4ZdF

Caroll Spinney was a beloved friend to millions of children & families who never knew his name — and a beloved son of Waltham & Acton MA. My thoughts are with Mr. Spinney’s family & the entire @SesameStreet community. His voice lives on in all of us. https://t.co/mdfS7j68up

I’m sick & tired of giant drug companies prioritizing profits over patients’ health. Greedy Gilead execs should not be able to abuse the patent system to get rich from #PrEP & we need to take steps to open the pharmaceutical market to more competition. https://t.co/bRIhVwMd4z

.@CBP said it won’t give recommended flu vaccines to detained families but the flu has been fatal to kids in its custody. I’ve said it before & I’ll say it again: this is an immoral irresponsible decision. @DHSgov must reverse it before more people die. https://t.co/JuiCfCk1f6 https://t.co/qVygKPHv3I

Servicemembers & their families deserve high-quality health care. I’m glad @DeptofDefense will start to cover 3D breast cancer screenings in the military health system. Earlier this year I urged DOD & cosponsored a bipartisan bill to require coverage of this preventive screening. https://t.co/PbqMV6HADt

I’m very glad the Senate passed a bipartisan bill to permanently fund HBCUs and other minority-serving colleges which I was proud to cosponsor. These schools have waited for funding certainly long enough – the House should pass the #FUTUREAct right away. https://t.co/aLb93xYlFb

Most of the big banks are bigger now than when taxpayers bailed them out in 2008 & the @BBT/@SunTrust merger will make this Too Big to Fail risk even worse. It’s time for Congress & our regulators to stand up to big banks & protect the American people. https://t.co/JGWsMCeRIA

@federalreserve @RepChuyGarcia Our bank merger bill would force regulators to consider how a bank merger affects consumers’ access to products like mortgages & small business loans. And it would require regulators to reject any bank merger that puts the economy – and working families – at risk.

Nearly 2 years ago Chairman Powell confirmed my worst suspicions: the @FederalReserve hasn’t denied a single bank merger since the 2008 financial crisis. @RepChuyGarcia & I are introducing a new bill to make sure regulators do their jobs & stop rubber-stamping bank mergers. https://t.co/SCUkvRPwrv

We need big bold action to fight the #ClimateCrisis – & I’m in this fight all the way. That’s why I’m proud to be an original cosponsor of @SenMarkey & @RepAOC’s #GreenNewDeal resolution to transform our economy & save our planet for our children & grandchildren.

The evidence is clear: climate change threatens our economy. And I have bills for that. I introduced the Climate Risk Disclosure Act & cosponsored @SenBrianSchatz’s Climate Change Financial Risk Act to make our economy more resilient to the #ClimateCrisis. https://t.co/pLVbzvEKwo

No family should have to struggle to put food on the table & no child should have to go to bed hungry. SNAP is a lifeline for millions of Americans in MA & across the country. We should be expanding this program – not tearing it apart. https://t.co/KA4E5lCzk5

20 years ago the @WorcesterFD courageously ran into a burning warehouse & six brave firefighters didn’t make it out. Today we honor the Worcester 6 & we remember the sacrifice that all our firefighters make to keep us safe every day. #W6 https://t.co/J7B9hm5a4O

For far too long big corporations have taken advantage of part-time workers with unpredictable work schedules – creating real hardships for them. My bill with @RepSchakowsky strengthens the rights stability & other protections workers deserve to build better financial futures.

The Part-Time Worker Bill of Rights Act would: ❌ Require big companies to offer available hours to part-time employees before hiring new employees/subcontractors ❌ Make more part-time employees eligible for FMLA ❌ Give part-time workers access to pension plans

2/3 of part-time retail & food workers want full-time work – but corporations often keep workers part-time to save on wages & benefits. @RepSchakowsky & I are introducing the Part-Time Worker Bill of Rights Act to boost protections for part-time workers. https://t.co/xRjBYrm98Q

All workers including Harvard grad students should have the right to organize & fight for better wages & working conditions. I've joined the entire MA delegation in urging Harvard’s leadership to negotiate in good faith with @hgsuuaw for a fair agreement. https://t.co/x5tOu9SEt8

Retail fast food & other hourly workers deserve some basic fairness when it comes to scheduling shifts. That’s why my #SchedulesThatWork Act with @rosadelauro would end some of the very worst abuses that hurt workers & families. #FairWorkWeek https://t.co/cUeWphPea2

Holtec shouldn't be exempt from important emergency prep safeguards as it decommissions the Pilgrim Nuclear Power Station. The community has rightly raised important questions about the plant's decommissioning. They deserve answers not more strong-arming. https://t.co/jF2hIw8MiF

US military hardware in the hands of armed groups in Yemen violates US law & undermines our security. Glad that @StateDept & @DeptofDefense are investigating but Saudi & UAE govts aren’t fully cooperating. I still think selling them arms is a bad idea. https://t.co/FIWEsC8Yap

President Trump's trade-war-by-tweet with China is hurting cranberry farmers in MA & across the country. @SenMarkey @USRepKeating @RepJoeKennedy & I are urging the @USTradeRep to find new markets to compensate for China’s 40% tariffs on US cranberries. https://t.co/rzLHmOlxza

This month my POW/MIA Flag Act became law. Starting this week you’ll see this Flag flying with the US flag over the Capitol permanently. This symbol must now be displayed daily at many federal sites across the nation so we never forget our servicemembers who didn’t return home. https://t.co/CqS9VnPtvW

Working families deserve a @CFPB that will get the tricks & traps out of credit cards & other financial products – & stand up to big banks credit card & fintech companies when they cheat & discriminate. I’ll keep fighting to hold the CFPB accountable until it does its job.

In the 2 yrs they’ve controlled @CFPB @MickMulvaneyOMB & @CFPBDirector have gutted its fair lending office stripped it of exam & enforcement powers & failed to file even 1 equal credit enforcement action. Could it be that banks know they can discriminate without consequences?

.@CFPB’s job is to enforce fair lending laws & stop discriminatory financial products. @SenSherrodBrown & I want @CFPBDirector to explain how @GoldmanSachs’ @Apple Card slipped through when women who apply may get worse terms than men with similar credit. https://t.co/SvUQfrmpm9

Our hearts go out to the crew of the F/V Leonardo their loved ones & to our entire fishing community in New Bedford. Fishing is more than a job or industry in MA – it's a family. We're grateful for the @USCG's tireless work today & every day. https://t.co/G9dBVxd5rF

On International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women let’s reaffirm our commitment to ensuring women & girls worldwide can live free from violence. The US can show leadership by reauthorizing the Violence Against Women Act. #OrangeTheWorld #VAWA4ALL https://t.co/vxYw80SD5z

Congrats to Boston Battery Wharf Hotel workers & @UNITEHERE26 for ratifying a new contract for better pay affordable health care fair scheduling & protections from sexual harassment & discrimination. It was a tough fight – but when workers fight workers win. https://t.co/3WYzF1NdPC

.@SenMarkey & I are proud to see @EnergyCommerce pass our Leonel Rondon Pipeline Safety Act with @RepLoriTrahan as part of their SAFER Pipelines Act – & we’re grateful for good neighbors like @RepAnnieKuster who fight to help keep the Merrimack Valley & all our communities safe. https://t.co/rE3rqNzfRG

Access to millions of patient records gives @Google a huge resource to build AI systems & other tech – especially in light of news that Google is trying to buy Fitbit. Regulators & medical experts are right to have big privacy & competition concerns. https://t.co/5kodqZjTxv

Medical records are extremely sensitive info that when mishandled expose patients to embarrassment discrimination & exploitation. Based on @Google’s prior privacy violations & security failures we need to know how they’re handling patient data & for what purposes.

I'm concerned by reports that @Google collected personal health information from 50 million Americans without their consent. @SenBlumenthal @SenBillCassidy & I want Google to explain “Project Nightingale” & how they’re planning to use this private data. https://t.co/ezJv10CBnM

In the past decade the @FederalReserve hasn’t denied a single bank merger application. It’s clear: the Fed works for the big rich banks – and everyone else pays the price. Earlier this year I told Chairman Powell: that needs to change. https://t.co/I65KA71iEg
The last thing our country needs is more Too Big To Fail banks. They put our entire economy – and working families – at risk. https://t.co/24VvfA7vAI

Everyone has a right to live in a safe & affordable home. I’m glad to join @NydiaVelazquez’s bold effort to invest $70B in the Public Housing Capital Fund to wipe out the backlog of public housing maintenance & repairs caused by years of underfunding. https://t.co/oYgygCErXo
Glad the #HongKongHumanRightsDemocracyAct passed the Senate. I’m proud to be a cosponsor of this bill which strengthens support for human rights & democracy in Hong Kong.

I’m concerned about private equity firms' investment in industries like nursing homes that care for seniors & people with disabilities & rely on government Medicaid & Medicare funding. That’s why I’ve got a bill to #StopWallStreetLooting & hold private equity firms accountable.

For-profit nursing home chains owned by private equity firms have more health & safety problems that put residents at risk. And the complicated ownership structure makes it hard for families to hold these homes legally liable for bad care.  #StopWallStreetLooting

Private equity firms have made big investments in big for-profit nursing home chains. @SenSherrodBrown @RepMarkPocan & I are investigating their role in the declining quality of nursing home care. #StopWallStreetLooting https://t.co/dSMmjgnglA

Sorry for interrupting the party @HHSGov – but before we spend more money to hang his portrait can we get answers to our questions about whether Tom Price paid back taxpayers for his wrongful use of private jets on the taxpayer’s dime? https://t.co/6eziMyn1Fv https://t.co/yishIcdnmC

Here’s the bottom line: private equity firms are putting millions of workers at risk by loading up companies with debt stripping assets & collecting huge fees. If the bets go bad they walk away. I’ll keep fighting to #StopWallStreetLooting & hold private equity accountable.

Ernst & Young’s industry-funded report paints a dishonest picture about private equity's effect on our economy. For example when EY calculated private equity-owned companies’ avg wages they included their Wall Street investors’ fat paychecks to skew the numbers. https://t.co/VOJGthXyFi

Private equity will do anything to kill my #StopWallStreetLooting Act – even funding a sham study by Ernst & Young to defend the industry. @RepMarkPocan @RepJayapal @SenatorBaldwin @SenSanders & I want EY to explain their report's glaring flaws. https://t.co/tqLY7MzNZY

Toys “R” Us. Radio Shack. Payless Shoes. Sports Authority. Mervyn’s. Shopko. For far too long private equity firms have destroyed retail stores & killed jobs hurt workers & drained our economy. We must #StopWallStreetLooting – & I have a bill for that. https://t.co/qTweUTdMGP
Devastating – and unacceptable. It's time for the @SenateGOP to stop working for the gun industry and start taking action to protect our children from senseless gun violence. https://t.co/UUACOzSzXF

It’s true: our student loan system IS fundamentally broken. That’s why @WhipClyburn & I have a bill to cancel student loan debt for 42 million Americans. Our bill will help close the racial wealth gap & end the student debt crisis. #CancelMyDebt

Dr. Johnson says that “repayment trends suggest much of the [student loan] debt will likely never be repaid” but @BetsyDeVosED refuses to lift a finger to help our students. If @usedgov is sitting on info confirming Dr. Johnson's conclusions the public deserves to see it.

Last month one of @BetsyDeVosED’s top student loan advisors abruptly resigned called the student loan system “fundamentally broken” & announced his support for student debt cancellation. @WhipClyburn & I want to know how he came to that conclusion. https://t.co/d9ObTTSefg

MA residents want clean air & water & safety for their communities. They don’t want Big Oil & Gas swooping in to turn a profit by shipping natural gas overseas. I’ll keep fighting alongside South Shore families to keep a compressor station out of Weymouth. https://t.co/AL79fFBUeY

Our brave firefighters risk their lives every day to keep us safe & it’s a tragedy when someone doesn’t make it home to their loved ones. My heart goes out to Lt. Menard’s family & friends & the entire @WorcesterFD for their loss. https://t.co/xenhkltOJ6

Valeria & her sister are woven into the fabric of our Commonwealth & our country. Their #HomeIsHere. I stand with our DACA recipients at the Supreme Court – and all of our Dreamers – who are fighting for the chance to build a future for themselves & their families. #HereToStay https://t.co/o8bo7poFIX

Last week I partnered with my colleagues on a bipartisan resolution urging the @USPS to commemorate some of the most courageous women veterans in our nation's history with a postage stamp series. It's one way we can honor their hard work & dedication. https://t.co/SOnflO5GVx

All 3 of my brothers served in the military & I appreciate the sacrifices & contributions that our servicemembers veterans & military families make for our country. We are grateful for their service – on #VeteransDay & every day. https://t.co/I1OZoa7Wrs

I’ve worked hard in the Senate to improve the lives of our veterans & military families. I co-led a bipartisan bill to streamline the process for veterans to get commercial driver’s licenses. I’m glad it was signed into law last year. https://t.co/RJQsoVQGXh
Welcome back to Massachusetts Ambassador @SenScottBrown and Gail! I know it will be good for New England Law Boston to have a dynamic leader. https://t.co/pCkD9CrufQ

All 3 of my brothers came home safe after their service but many do not. My bipartisan bill signed into law this week ensures that the POW/MIA Flag is prominently displayed & that we never forget our servicemembers who haven’t returned home. https://t.co/rlsSVbLBbK

.@SenatorMenendez issued a report showing the Trump administration recklessly ignored the warnings of career @StateDept officials about ending humanitarian protections for TPS recipients from El Salvador Honduras & Haiti. More proof of this administration's heartless policies. https://t.co/gWELClCMm7
